resources.string:
Special thanks also to Zak for designing that cool app icon and all other great stuff. 
 All icons credited below are from www.flaticon.com and licensed under CC BY 3.0 
 Icon 'Windy Twister' made by Tintins 
 Icons 'Cloud', 'Rain cloud' made by Yannick 
 Icons 'Dust', 'Wind lines', 'Low temperature thermometer', 'Favourites filled star symbol', 'Sad rounded square emoticon' and 'Earth' made by Freepik 
 Icon 'Foggy day' made by Amit Jakhu 
 Icon 'Shinning sun' made by Icon Works 
 Icon 'Moon phase outline' made by Rami McMin
